Gets the API user's list of alerts

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"page","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"name":"cutoff","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer"},"description":"Unix timestamp of oldest alert to include. Note that unread or unviewed alerts are always included."},{"name":"unviewed","in":"query","schema":{"type":"boolean"},"description":"If true, gets only unviewed alerts. Unviewed alerts have not been seen (in the standard UI)."},{"name":"unread","in":"query","schema":{"type":"boolean"},"description":"If true, gets only unread alerts. Unread alerts may have been seen but the content they relate to has not been viewed."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
